#include <iostream>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <map>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	long long t, i, n, x, sum;
	char s[25], sign;
	scanf("%lld" ,&t);
	while(t--)
	{
	sum=0;
	scanf("%lld", &n);
	map<string , int> m;

	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%s ", s);
		scanf(" %c", &sign);
		
			if(sign == '+')
			{
			m[s] = 1;
			}
			else
			{
				m[s] = -1;
			}
		}
		
	for(map<string, int>::iterator it = m.begin();it!= m.end(); ++it)
	{sum += it->second;
//	cout<<it->first;
//	printf(" %lld\n", sum);			
	
}
printf("%lld\n", sum);			
}
	return 0;
}
